scripts.test: if [ -d "test" ]; then $npm_execpath run warn; else $npm_execpath run test-ts; fi;
scripts.coverage: if [ -d "test" ]; then $npm_execpath run warn; else $npm_execpath run coverage-ts; fi;
scripts.warn:
echo "Refusing to overwrite 'test' directory. Run '\033[1;33m$npm_execpath run clean\033[0m'.
"
scripts.test-ts: trap "$npm_execpath run clean" INT TERM; ($npm_execpath run bindings:ts && tsc && truffle test); $npm_execpath run clean
scripts.coverage-ts: trap "$npm_execpath run clean" INT TERM; ($npm_execpath run bindings:ts && tsc && solidity-coverage); $npm_execpath run clean
scripts.bindings:go: solc --allow-paths . --combined-json bin,abi,userdoc,devdoc,metadata $(find contracts -type f -name '*.sol') | abigen -pkg bindings --out bindings.go --abi -
